The entity "MSSA" clearly refers to a disease, specifically methicillin-sensitive Staphylococcus aureus, a type of bacterial infection. The other entities in the paragraph, "Lumbar puncture" and "blood cultures," do not refer to diseases, so they are not included in the table.
